analytic.title: The Chaldeo-Indian “Divine Praises” and the Recent Instruction of the Congregation for Eastern Churches

monogr.title: Bride at the Feet of the Bridegroom: Studies in East Syrian Liturgical Law. A Tribute to Archbishop Mar Joseph Powathil

body.bibl: Pathikulangara, Varghese. “The Chaldeo-Indian ‘Divine Praises’ and the Recent Instruction of the Congregation for Eastern Churches.” In Bride at the Feet of the Bridegroom: Studies in East Syrian Liturgical Law. A Tribute to Archbishop Mar Joseph Powathil, edited by Antony George Kollamparampil and Joseph Perumthottam, 243–61. Catholic Theological Studies of India 1. Changanassery: HIRS Publications, 1997.

Varghese Pathikulangara, The Chaldeo-Indian ‘Divine Praises’ and the Recent Instruction of the Congregation for Eastern Churches, in Bride at the Feet of the Bridegroom: Studies in East Syrian Liturgical Law. A Tribute to Archbishop Mar Joseph Powathil, ed. Antony George Kollamparampil and Joseph Perumthottam, Catholic Theological Studies of India 1 (Changanassery: HIRS Publications, 1997), 243–61.
